headline: Will Rising Global Government IT Budgets Refocus Gartner's (IT) AI and Cybersecurity Narrative?
summary: A recent Gartner survey found that more than half of government CIOs outside the US expect IT budgets to rise in 2026, with cybersecurity, cloud platforms, and AI, including generative AI, as top spending priorities. The survey suggests that despite tight public finances, demand for advanced technology insights is strong as governments focus on both risk management and efficiency improvements. We'll look at how rising government IT budgets focused on AI and cybersecurity could influence...
